Here is a bullet list of required elements:

*   A metal saucepan (similar in style to the original image)
*   A gas stovetop (similar in style to the original image)
*   An active gas flame from the burner beneath the saucepan
*   A very small quantity of vigorously boiling water remaining at the bottom of the saucepan
*   Visible dried residue or mineral scale coating the inner sides of the saucepan, above the current low water level
*   Abundant steam rising from the saucepan
*   Water condensation visible on the backsplash and/or stovetop surfaces near the saucepan
*   Heat-induced discoloration on the exterior bottom of the saucepan
